website_summaries.verdict: A warm, functional hoodie that both you and your dog will love.
pros: Printable measuring tape and accurate sizing charts are available prior to purchase to ensure the best fit
Made from soft cotton and polyester blend
Back pocket is functional, perfect for treats
Includes a secure loop to attach your dog’s leash
cons: Hood is quite small and likely not wearable on most dogs

customer_reviews.title: Order larger
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I know better than to buy according to the size chart. My 80 pound boxer is more golden retriever / bulldog size (XL) rather than mastiff / Great Dane size (XXL) according to the guide from the maker. XL on my boxer is a joke. It's tight enough that he won't move now that it's on. Look at his face in the picture! He wears a fleece with a Velcro closure without that face. I will gift it to a smaller female boxer we know.
customer_reviews.author: North and South

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a 65 lbs pit bull and the XXL fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Dockrey

customer_reviews.title: too cute
customer_reviews.text: i got a small for my minpin & it is totally awesome! i love how its exactly like a human hoodie meaning same fabric & nice soft inside. extremely well made & seems it will last for a very long time. my minpin loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: sheena

customer_reviews.title: WAYYYY TOO SMALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS WAYYYYY SMALLER THAN ADVERTISED. I measured my dog twice to make sure I got the right measurements and ordered the right size. Not only did it NOT fit my dog AT ALL — it was so small that it was impossible to put on him — but it was too tiny to fit my cat, who is at lost 2/3’s the size of my dog. I can’t believe it!!! Plus, it was a little long, so even if it was remotely possible for it to be put on Freckles (my male dog, for whom it was intended), he would’ve ended up peeing on it when he went outside, most likely.
customer_reviews.author: IHF FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: Not practical for male dogs
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is cut in a way that causes it to cover the male organ. Because of that, he will be urinating on it. Not good, or sanitary. I bought the first one and returned it, thinking that a smaller size would solve the problem. I had to return the second one, it covered his equipment as well and was too little. He is a 22 pound West Highland White Terrier, yet it was tight around his chest and too long at the tail end. Strange fit! I think the quality of the fabric was nice, but would stay nice on a female dog only.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT !!
customer_reviews.text: Our FAVORITE hoodie for our pup. We use it daily in the spring, fall, and early winter. Even have a blue one, and will purchase more. It's such a nice fit to pull on and off our Lhasa Apso and Shih Tzu mix (23lb). We mostly use it to protect his bright white coat from dirt, leaves, and insects, but its cotton- so it also keeps his warm and comfy too. It doesn't bother him one bit. Just make sure to measure your furball before ordering and you shouldn't have any problems. Well made too! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very soft. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: We got a large for our stocky pug. He’s taller and more barrel shaped than most pugs so it’s difficult to find things that fit his chest but aren’t too long. It was too long for him, which I knew it would be, so I hemmed it up for him when I made it into his costume and now it’s perfect. It is made very well, very soft and cozy. He loves it. I say it fits as expected because I expected it to be long on him. I included pictures of the before altering and after.
customer_reviews.author: shop4aday

customer_reviews.title: It should be more than comfortable for our dog to wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Medium going off of the size chart. It should be more than comfortable for our dog to wear. Paid extra to have it same day. What a waste. It barely fit over his head, and when we finally got it on him he couldn't even move. If you are looking for a skin tight body suit to hold your dog in place, get the size it tells you. If you want your dog to be comfortable, get a size or two up. Very dissapointed since i paid to have it same day. Will see if the size exchange actually goes through and if the new size (2 sizes bigger) will actually fit him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the charts or labeling on this product
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog before ordering, even wrote the measurements so I wouldn't get it wrong. Placed my order for a medium hoodie according to the size charts and due to the many 5 star reviews. What I got was so tiny it might fit a teacup chihuahua that at the widest part wouldn't have fit on my dog's head, much less cover his body. The packaging stated Medium, and there was the letter "L" on the inner wrapping, and a label with "L" sewn inside the hoodie. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Hoodie received first was NOT authentic
customer_reviews.text: The XS we received on the left was NOT of the same quality of the size S Zack & Zoey on the right. The hole for the harness/collar is missing, the fabric is entirely different, there is no tag on the inside like there is for the right, and the front pocket is shaped differently. To top it off, both were supposed to be the same color. I actually really like the lavender color of the raspberry sorbet, but the quality was terrible. I was really disappointed considering both items were shipped and sold by Amazon. The true Zack & Zoey is great, just way too big for our sweet Frenchie pup.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pie

customer_reviews.title: Great for (agreeable) cats too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoodie for my cat. He's almost 12 pounds and he is a long, sleek fellow rather than a chubbier variety of feline. I ordered a small for him and it fits absolutely perfectly. It seems to have a moderately calming effect on him (perhaps akin to a thunder shirt) which is a bonus. The material is lightweight sweater material. It's easy to take off and put on. There is a small hole at the back of the neck for a leash to clip through, but I'd much sooner just cut a hole to attach a leash to a harness instead if that were something I needed. Great color, easy to wash, will probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: yupKat

customer_reviews.title: Runs 2 sizes small but so adorable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two, one for my 60 lb. pittie and one for my 16 lb. beagle chihuahua. After I read the size measurements, I ordered an x-tra large for my pit, and a medium for beagle chihuahua. According to the sizes on the tag, a medium should have fit my pit and an x-tra small should have fit my beagle chihuahua. They both just barely fit, and the hoodie part is too small to go over their heads. Also, it's only good for female dogs, because it extends so far down their body that male dogs will urinate on it. Other than that, it's super soft and now my pups are toasty warm it it looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverWild

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, needs slight mod for male dogs, Our dog wears these often!
customer_reviews.text: This ran smaller than we expected, but we used it on a smaller dog. However the design needs to be modified for boy dogs because its too long on the belly area and they get it wet while going potty. We used scissors and cut out an upside down U-shape from the belly area. Now he has a great hoody and coverage on his back and it stays dry when he goes potty. If u have a female dog you probably won’t have this challenge. We have washed it several times and the fabric hasn't frayed even though our modification is not hemmed. Hope this was useful. :-)
customer_reviews.author: kcdctx22

customer_reviews.title: Nice but can't pee in it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 55 lb lab mix. I bought the XL because it would fit around his chest, which it does. A little tight in the arm holes but nothing that makes him uncomfortable. However, the worst part is the middle. Underneath it is wayyy too long. If you do not fold it up, or cut it, he will pee on it every single time. Which is frustrating, because there is no way we could have gotten a small size. My boy is a bit chubs but there is no way it was meant for a lab like him.
customer_reviews.author: jl9988Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality. My dog gave it the Pee Seal of Approval. Its a bit long for him and he pee's on it if wearing it outside, but he wears it inside the house when its cooler but not worth turning on the heat. Or when we are out at the fire pit on cool nights. My Dog weighs about 9lbs and is a Chihuahua It is the tiniest bit too big on him. I recomend it for Dogs -8-12 lbs. If the dog is over 12lbs you are right on the edge of wanting to buy this. I will try and upload photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly

customer_reviews.title: Good material, runs on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs, one, a pitbull, wears a large. She's petite (1 year old), so I bought her an XL in case she outgrows the large ones. This would be the 3rd I purchased, the first two were great quality, fit well and held up to playing and running. She gets very cold this time of year, and these are warm but not restrictive. The 3rd arrived today with small holes all along the back. I'm not sure if this was an Amazon or manufacturing error, but super disappointing! If it weren't for that, it would have been 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit, good price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but not my favorite buy so far as dog clothes go. The overall length is good, but the hood is super tiny and as a result it comes across as a turtleneck rather than a hoodie. Despite following the size chart it's also a little too tight across the shoulders and through the armpits; I'm hoping it stretches out somewhat but I'd recommend future buyers go up a size. The material is fairly thin, but I wanted a lighter sweatshirt for mild spring weather- perfect for that, wouldn't really suggest it for winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's so bad, that she's been mistaken for taxidermy by people
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely hates to wear clothes. It's so bad, that she's been mistaken for taxidermy by people, as she will literally stand frozen in hopes that whatever my wife and I put on her will just fall off. The only problem is, whenever it gets below 45 degrees, she turns into a shivering popsicle. For us... this hoodie has been the perfect option for casual strolls throughout the neighborhood. It could just be my imagination, but whenever I wear my black hoodie, and put hers on, it's almost like she has a little Bonnie and Clyde strut to her. If you're in the market for a simple, minimalistic and comfortable jacket for your 4 legged friend.. this hoodie delivers.
customer_reviews.author: CAPO

customer_reviews.title: So cute but order up a size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these hoodies for my babies for the winter! They are so cute, the colors are accurate to what you see online but the sizing seems off at least for my pack! I measured exactly as the size chart stated and ordered the sizes based on the measurements; all 4 had to be exchanged for a size up. My dogs are from 9 lbs to 90 lbs. So while cute, soft and warm I would suggest ordering a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo adorable!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutley adorable! My Bassett/beagle mix is only 4 months old and weighs about 20lbs and I got her a medium. It fits her almost perfect. It's a little loose on her body but shes still growing. I will be purchasing another in a large for when shes fully grown. The only thing is the hood doesn't fit her head the best. But she has the big basset floppy ears. Other than that so cute. I will edit with a picture when I can get her to sit still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best puppywear anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Zack & Zoey is my pomeranians go to sweatshirt. They have been for years. Last fall i ordered and recieved 2 sweatshirts that were too small and terrible quality. I was nervous to order again but for his birthday we ordered 2 more and they were the AMAZING quality i have always loved and fit perfectly. High High quality. Not sure what happened that 1 tine but im a FUREVER fan of Zack & Zoey brand and so is Pickles the Pom 💙
customer_reviews.author: WORCESTER

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!! This was NOT worth the wait. 1st, it came almost 1 month later, from freaking China. 2nd, their version of a 28" chest is delusional. Look at the photo. I ordered a large, 28" chest. This sweater is the size of my size 10 sneaker. I bought this for my 65 lb staffy... I was so upset when I opened this package. Never will I buy from this seller or this brand again. I will be sure to tell everyone I know how misinterpreting and false this brand is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have a male dog, do not buy these
customer_reviews.text: I have two huge problems with the doggie sweatshirt. 1. They are not made for male dogs. The belly is cut too long, so the male dog ends up peeing all over the shirt. 2. The hoods are made for humans, not dogs, so the hood falls down into the dogs eyes to where he can't see where he is going. I've seen this over and over in any hooded product for dogs. Apparently no one that makes these things actually try them on a real dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine D.

customer_reviews.title: No good for pit mix chesty types ;(
customer_reviews.text: Not sized for pitbull mix. Avoid if your dog has a big chest or a broad shape. It would be awesome for a skinnier dog but not for my muscle bound mister, sadly. Colour style fabric all lovely, but sizing chart with chest measurement in addition to length would be great. No way my big 65lb guy could wear the extra large and pee without problem as way too long, but also way too tight across his chest and front legs. Too bad as this item is a good value compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: NoSlouch

customer_reviews.title: 13lb Male Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: i love the colors, the material everything is wonderful. I bought a couple for my female. I bought a medium for my male yorkie to fit his 16 in back length. The chest area is loose, but the main problem is that underneath is too long to accommodate my male dog. There is pee all the way up the sweatshirt. My only solution is to alter the length underneath
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wojo

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but I still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this sweatshirt for my dog. It will serve as her new winter coat for the cold winters in Michigan. I will say that it runs very small. By the measurements and breed examples, my American Brittany Spaniel should be a size medium, but the large fit her quite snugly. Just be aware of this if you purchase this item. Still, it seems fairly durable and comfortable. I would still recommend this product despite the inaccurate size descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, trying to get the size right. I thought I had it with the second order: two sizes larger than other brands. But then I washed it and put it in the dryer. It shrank down about two sizes, so now I'm back to where I started: way too small. Other than the small size, the hoodie was soft and warm. Just don't put it in the dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Bee Charmer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the pitbull body type, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a great fit for my pitbull who has a wide chest. I bought a size up hoping it would be big enough, not only is it still too tight on his chest, the up size causes it to be to long and the way its designed underneath it sometimes covers his privacy causing him to pee inside the sweater which is obviously a disaster. That said, the quality is pretty good, and he looks super cute in it. I would definitely recommend if you have a dog with a narrow chest and a long body.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: The company is still not listening
customer_reviews.text: I read they are too long. No kidding. I have a 60-pound pit and I purchased xxLarge because I read the arms can be too tight and I didn't want to risk it. But the length drags the ground in back. Dogs aren't that long. It is poorly proportioned. Still, it is so cute that I just cut the whole back off of it and she wears it anyway. But please Zack and Zoey, I've read hundreds of reviews and your customers repeatedly tell you the proportions are off and still you do not listen and change the pattern. Increase the armhole size and shorten the length. Otherwise you will never get top ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HOODIE FOR POOCHIES
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these hoodies for my dog. My dog is a mix of English Bulldog and Puggle, which means she has the wider body built of an English Bulldog, which is why I had to get the Extra-Large for the hoodie to fit her shoulder girth. However, the extra-large is a bit too long for the rest of her body (it hangs below her booty) so I tie the bottom up in a bun (i.e., the lazy way of fixing large clothing rather than sewing it). Overall, I LOVE these hoodies so much I ended up getting two more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: TinieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for warmth but not convenient for male dogs
customer_reviews.text: These hoodies are great for when my Italian Greyhound-mix, who is always chilly, needs a little extra warmth at night. However, they are not the best option for boy dogs because they are so long. I have to be absolutely sure to roll the bottom up before I let my pup out to tinkle. Also, be warned when you wash these, the colors will bleed through quite a few washings. Overall happy with the purchase. Both my dogs wear them a lot through the winter months. SIZING: My 20-lb Italian Greyhound mix wears a Large My 14-lb Silky Terrier wears a Medium
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: This sweatshirt hoodie is soooo cute! It's made nicely and has a buttonhole at the top to put your leash through and attach to a harness worn underneath, which I like a lot so we can wear it on walks. She gets a lot of smiles and compliments from people when she's wearing this. I went by the measurements on the chart and it fits well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Z.

customer_reviews.title: would probably be better for dogs not shaped like potatoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Size L for a Small 35 lb English Bulldog. I have to return for several reasons. #1- The body is not large enough around, and too long in length. Weird shape, would probably be better for dogs not shaped like potatoes. #2- The actual hoodie part is a lot smaller than any other hoodies she has, which isnt the worst thing in the world, but made her just look weird. I might try for the xl, but i think it will be way too long.
customer_reviews.author: K. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Basically Good
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is adorable, and it’s stretchy enough to be comfortable. However, in order to get the width/depth I needed for my 70-pound Cane Corso mix, I had to get an XXL, which is WAY too long for him. I am going to have to alter it. I got a large for my 40-pound Boston Terrier, which has the same issue - great fit everywhere except the length down the dog’s body. Let’s just say that, before I have the chance to alter it, they will need to take them off before they take a potty break - ANY kind of potty break.
customer_reviews.author: adamelio

customer_reviews.title: Love these a lot.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome - thick enough for a chilly day but not bulky, super soft. I found that the "arm" bands were a little more snug than I like, but if you stretch them when it's damp from the wash they loosen up and hold the expanded shape. They weren't terribly tight, but I have furry dogs. Colors are great, they wash nicely, the fit is comfortably loose on my lean, athletic dogs. Great warmies. Also, I really like hoods - the dogs don't wear them on their heads, but it makes it so that their neck gets a built in snugly scarf kind of effect.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for my bully who is not a fan of the cold
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 month old bully girl who weighs about 50 lbs. While she's technically medium-sized, I took the advice of one reviewer and order her the XL size. It fits PERFECTLY in the chest/shoulders. It's obviously too long and loose in the body, but since she's a girl it doesn't really interfere with the "doing of her business". The color (purple) is as pictured, the hoodie is nice and soft, and Hazel looks adorable in it. It's just enough of an added layer for the crispy fall weather and should be good through winter as well so the poor thing doesn't get too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Domh D. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for dogs with deeper chests.
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard size rat terrier. Breed has a somewhat deeper chest. I bought the recommended Med size based on measurements. It was too tight across chest but fit length. Returned and ordered Large, still tight across chest and too long for body. Nice hoodie and seems well sewn. Will donate to Humane Society and find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: robred99

customer_reviews.title: SOFT, CUTE & PERFECT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoodie for my adorable 1-year-old basenji pup, who has non-standard measurements which usually poses an issue when buying clothing for her. But this hoodie fits her PERFECTLY! It's soft, warm and she's super cute when she wears it! Being a short-haired dog whose ancestors derive from hot climates like Africa and Egypt, she gets rather cold in the winter- even when indoors. So I was looking for a solution and this hoodie is perfect! Whenever she's cold I just slip it on her and she absolutely loves wearing it (no joke)! If your dog fits the measurements, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: trinitymal

customer_reviews.title: Poor sewing & too small
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to arrive, shipped from China. Poor sewing - already coming apart in 2 places when received. See photos. Also, way too small for my dog, even though I measured her and ordered according to the chart. It's a thin, plastic feeling material - doubt it would provide much warmth. I wonder about the positive reviews - did the product have a change in manufacturing?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing and on/off is rough.
customer_reviews.text: Another Zack & Zoey disappointment...got the XL and it's too big as the coat by them I got was, but also really hard to get off so I'm not going to return and size down like I did with the coat. Cute design, good quality, just not sized very well. It's too long over my dog's butt, but getting it off of that first paw is kind of a nightmare since it doesn't zip and it isn't really stretchy so it feels like trying to take something that's too *small* off, not too large. I may take it in and add a zipper to make it work better.
customer_reviews.author: V. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend these sweaters at all
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend these sweaters at all, especially for male dogs. The sweater does not have the curv cut out so they pee on it when they go and within 2 days they smelled horrible so I washed them and when I pulled them out of the dryer both sweaters were torn from the exact same spot. Cheap quality and a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Efren Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Hangs a bit to low on the belly side
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and material, very great looking and looks so warm and cozy on my Silver labrador however the belly area hangs a bit lower than it should which causes him to pee inside of the hoodie each time he pees. With a bit of stitching and cutting I'm sure it can be fixed and a smaller size would definitely be too small. Overall very Nice.
customer_reviews.author: DUKE

customer_reviews.title: So cute but the sizing is pretty off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a large and an extra large for my pittie mix with a 17.5" neck, 28" chest, and 20" long back. The large was WAY too small. I couldn't even get it on her even though she was at the top end of the chart provided. The xl is way too big but it works...kinda. I gave my large to a friend that the medium should fit based on the chart and it just barely fit. The sweatshirt is incredibly cute, has an amazingly soft inside, and is very warm. My dog does seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley84

customer_reviews.title: A good looking hoodie with an odd fit.k,.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking hoodie. I like the material. My major concern is the fit. I prefer a loose-fitting hoodie for my dog. He is a 14.5 pound miniature poodle mix. I bought a medium size (16), but it was closer to his body than I would have liked. The hoodie is also on the long side. If you dog has a long, thin body; this is the hoodie for you.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Fits as described and my dog stays warm at night.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my dog well and exactly as described. I measured him exactly as instructed and my dog fits perfectly. A tip for other dog owners, put the hood on while your dog is standing and put his or her arms through while they're on their back. Super easy. My dog was bred in a super hot and humid climate (Catahoula Leopard) and will shiver me awake at 3:00am if he doesn't have covers or this hoodie. He gets excited when I take it out of the coat closet for him. I will probably buy more but this one is holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Spinks

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is nice. Good quality. Looks cute. Did not fit my pug very well though.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is nice. Good quality. Looks cute. Did not fit my pug very well though. I think these are made for more standard shaped dogs. I ordered a size up since my pug has a standard barrel shaped body...but then the larger size was too long. I ended up just trimming the larger size down. If your dog has a regular average shaped dog body it should be fine. Bear in mind some breeds have different shapes and this might be too long and narrow for them.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Softer than any sweater I own!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered 2 size Large sweaters for my pug puppies assuming they could simply grow into the sweater. The large was way to long for them so I sent that size back and ordered 2 mediums. My female dog measures 17" in length and is weighs 17 pounds. My male dog measures 18" in length and weighs 19 pounds. Do not go by the Recommended sizing my dog type! According to that chart my pugs would need to wear a small. They are growing puppies and the Medium fits perfectly with room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Our 26lb. whippet loves this sweatshirt and he looks adorable in it too. This is one of the few brands that fits his unique shape with no problem, and bonus it actually keeps him warm! He has almost no body fat and very little fur and so clothing is essential in our cold northern Illinois winters. It's machine washable and hasn't shrunk or pilled in the dryer. The fleece lining is a great touch, he just loves his hoodie!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Is Waaay Off!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL for my 80-lb lab mix whose measurements are 21-32-24 (Neck/Chest Girth/Length). This is the Product Description I copied & pasted off of Amazon's website: "Comes in X-large size. Fits neck with 20-24-inch size and also fits chest with 28-34-inch size. Measures 24-inch length". My poor little pup was busting out like a bratwurst when I tried it on him! It's a well-made hoodie and just what I was looking for but sizing is waaaay, waaaayyy off. I would've tried to make it work but not only it was too tight around the neck, but the sleeves/chest was also way too tight and restrictive. For these reasons, I am returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lmlwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: First one of two size large hoodies came in the mail today for my 1 yo, 39lb lab who is about 25 in around the widest part of her chest. Sizing chart was true to actual size, but it's a little snug in the shoulders so for a more muscular dog it might be too tight. I will also hang dry after washing because it's the perfect fit and I don't want to risk it shrinking (the material is soft, but feels as though it would shrink in the dryer) Either way, great product and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rood

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these dog hoodies are great and they look really adorable on as well. I have already been a repeat customer because I love the color selection in which I use under my dogs wind breaker as well as rain coat. I have purchased several of these as gifts for other people and they liked them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Again, my cat must hate me but this was by far my favorite garment I got him! Purchased the medium size for my 15lb jelly belly cat and it fit perfectly. Not too snug on him, but fitted enough to avoid getting tangled. He stays warm, I get my chuckles. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but too long
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XXL size for my 95-lb boxer. The width and neck size were perfect, but the length was way too long! We joked that it was made for a 100-lb doxen! I ended up sewing it to remove some of the excess material in the middle so my dog doesn't pee on it. After alterations, it's a nice sweater. Keeps my dog warm!
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little more expensive than some of the others, but the size/fitting seemed better in the reviews. It works well and is cute on our miniature poodle mix - she weighs about 12 pounds and is a little long. It fits her very well. Loose enough that it's not tight, but keeps her warm. I don't think it would work well for a male dog however.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It's not too heavy and it's cute, relatively inexpensive and looks pretty well made. My dog Dixie is about 20lbs and I noticed that she gets really cold when she's outside and even sometimes when she's indoors. I have never had this problem before as my other dogs have always been 50lbs and have very thick coats, but Dixie doesn't. I put her in this and she's nice and snuggly now, although we'll see how long that lasts. She's a chewer and tends to tear things up easily. I do think they might run a little small - I got her a large and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Green; Medium; 38 pound Vizsla
customer_reviews.text: I have an almost 2 year old, 38 pound Vizsla. Its very cold in our office all year round so i got her a jacket. I bought her a medium and ended having to cut the arm holes a little bit as it was too snug around her chest.. I should have bought a large, whoops. . She has a very long body and the jacket fits all the way to her butt which is a plus. Great buy and overall a very cute jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but be careful of the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have a 52 pound female boxer who is 16 months old and she's fit and trim. I got the Large based on measurements and chart breed recommendation. Love the product but be careful of the sizing. It was way too small. It was hard to get on and she had difficulty walking. Took it off immediately and that was even harder to do! I ordered the XL for her. Hopefully, we have a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy Pups
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one for each of our dogs, one pink and one gray. Both dogs are ~20 pounds, one is long and leans, the other a bit stockier. Both dogs got a medium and they seem to fit OK. Because it's a bit tighter on our stockier male, he's able to wear it while going to the bathroom without issues. Our female terrier loves it. She came from a warmer climate and hates WI weather. This keeps her warm, allows for plenty of mobility, and seems like it can withstand a fair amount of abuse from playing and scratching (we've had them for over a year now).
customer_reviews.author: Keri L.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate sizing information would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: I measured the dog as directed. It said if it was at the top of the size range to go up a size. Lies. He was tripping over it because it was huge. But because there was nothing wrong with it I had to pay for shipping to return it. But I guess they can have two stars because the hoodie was good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B-rae

customer_reviews.title: The small fits perfect, cover her back and is not snug
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 8 pounds, has a neck circumference of around 10 inches and a chest girth of around 17 inches, and back length of a little over 11 inches. The small fits perfect, cover her back and is not snug. I'll be purchasing more colors. I don't have much luck with pet store doggy sweaters, they tend to be too snug and short, or too big if i go up a size
customer_reviews.author: MustLoveDogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wow it runs Small. Plus it might shrink in the wash. Maybe go up 2 sizes?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Large, and Amazon sent a Small. So now I have to go through the inconvenience of returning this item and reodering it again. While the material and stitching are nice, the Small is very very Small. It would certainly not fit a Frenchie or JRT unless it was the runt of the litter and was starving with ribs showing through. The small would maybe fit my 10# cat, but not my 14# Tom. Now I am wondering if instead of a Large, I should order an Extra Large for my Whippet-sized, 23# dog.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my doberman very well.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is quite nice. Its made nof the same jersey materials as those sold for humans. It even has a pocket. The hood part is too small for my dog. So it just sits there behind her head. It might as well have just not ever even been attached, as much good as it does. I bought an XL for my Doberman and , other than that worthless hood, it fits very well. It barely shrunk when washed.
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: Worked out
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 55lb pit mix well. She’s not a stocky or musclier dog at all, so we had no problem fitting her into it. She loves to wear it, and seems to find it comfortable. My only complaint is that the hood is just for decoration. It’s not long enough to actually pull over her head.
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: Random Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Even though I used the provided sizing chart with my dogs measurements to pick the size, it was not correct. I bought 2 of these hoodies, different colors in the same size. First of all, like I said, I used the size chart and ordered 2 in different colors, both size M, the hoodies I received were 2 very different sizes, one was about a size S and the other was a size L... Neither was a size M as labeled and described in the size chart. Second, they are shipped from China and you are not able to cancel the order once it is placed.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: So cute 😍
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes. So adorable!!! I ended up buying this for my Pomeranian Shih Tzu mix for when his hair was cut short and it was seriously the cutest thing ever on him. We ended up buying it in multiple colors because we were so please! The bottom was a little long and he did pee on it but it washed amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Ehimmelman

customer_reviews.title: May require some adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Its a wonderful hoodie, but its unfortunate that there isn't a size between large and extra large. The L is too tight and not long enough on my golden retriever, but the XL is too long and loose on him. I actually had to cut and sow the material around his penis so he wouldn't pee all over it
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: My cat has seasonal allergies which make him itchy. When they act up, I put this hoodie on him so that he doesn't open a sore on his skin. This item not only seems breathable for my cat, but holds up to his licking and scratching. I basically buy one of these a year now since I like it to look fresh on him ;)
customer_reviews.author: underconcerned citizen

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The armpits fit which is the most important part for dog clothes to me. Based on reviews I sized up. It is a big long in the back, but I’m keeping it because it fits everywhere else. It’s adorable. Likely will get more. It’s a lighter material. I have a 3 year old Dutch Shepherd mix 65 pounds and bought the xxl.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Peak

customer_reviews.title: Too long under belly for a boy dog
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium because that’s the size my dog normally wears it fits perfect everywhere but under his belly so if he wears it out to use the bathroom he pees all over it. I started the exchange process but the small will be to tight everywhere else. So I decided I’m just going to try and alter it so the underbelly does not get Peed on. The hoodie is great quality supersoft and super warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lilley

customer_reviews.title: It's kind of like a Snuggie for dogs
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of like a Snuggie for dogs! Originally purchased the XL, which was a little small for my boxer to squeeze into. I bought the XXL and she fits into it very well but it is too long and the excess gets caught under her hind legs and it would be impossible for her to relieve herself, so the sizing is not quite right for my barrel chested dog. Watch my demonstration video.
customer_reviews.author: RC Beach Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hoodie I've found for our 60lb lab/pointer mix. Our dog is long and lean, and often sweaters can be too short for her. This one is completely different. It's extra long and covers her backside. Although the top is nice and long, the bottom is not, which is great as it doesn't prevent your dog from going to the bathroom. The sweater does start to pill after a while; however, the black color is less noticeable. We've also gotten several compliments on how cute our dog looks wearing this because it really does look like an actual sweatshirt. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a look
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and cheap. I bought this same brand in a different color for another dog a few hrs ago. I was expecting the same quality but it definitely is no longer the same. This is low quality like you could find it in the dollar store. Bought a large as my dogs neck is 15,length 21, and girth 24 which should fit well but it’s very snug. Sending it back was not free it was going to cost me a third of the price or free with a 45 min drive away. Never mind, I’ll keep it and give it away. I don’t recommend to my worst enemy
customer_reviews.author: Arman

customer_reviews.title: Sizing way off
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is WAY off on these hoodies, however they are made of great quality, the color is vibrant. The seller was very pleasant to work with on the return, I will be ordering a replacement just in a smaller size. My bully pup is approximately 60-ish pounds, very large chest and this was just way to big for him. Like it would have fit our 130lb rottweiler big. I took off two stars only for the inconvenience of having to package back up and return.
customer_reviews.author: Kelzp

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My lab is 85 lbs, 22” around the neck and 32” around the chest. I purchased the x-large for him and it fits perfectly. It’s a slim fit instead of loose, which is great because he’ll try to take it off if it fits loosely lol. The hood is a bit on the small side though as you can see from the pic, but the item as a whole is decently made and the inside is fleece lined. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eboney86

customer_reviews.title: X-Large was too small for our golden retriever  and xxlarge is too big. Nice fabric!
customer_reviews.text: Since the size chart shows that X-Large is good for golden retreivers we initially bought the X-Large but it was really tight on our golden especially around her legs so we returned it and we ordered the xxlarge that is in fact too big as you can see on our picture. But we decided to keep the xxlarge because it's more comfortable for her. I Will try to fix it. The quality of the fabric is good! 35% cotton and polyester.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie! For pitbulls, go XL
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The hoodie is made of great material, and the color is true to what was advertised. I have a 60lb pittie who is small-ish for her breed but still stocky in the chest. I bought her an XL, which fits perfect and leaves just a little room. I would recommend the XL for anyone with a fairly average-sized pitbull. I will certainly be buying from this brand in the future. I'm really happy with the quality of this dog hoodie.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money: ( I actually thought I was ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is wrong. I ordered the large for my 45 lb pit mix. Said it was the size that would fit a boxer or lab. This was way too tight on my dog. So I need an extra large for a 45 lb dog? Order a larger size then what you think you need! Wasted money :( I actually thought I was ordering it too large and that I would only need a medium...
customer_reviews.author: tonia

customer_reviews.title: Great color, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't have a ton of fur so she gets cold sometimes. This was a perfect solution. She doesn't mind wearing it at all. The color is nice. She is odd shaped, long muscly body and short legs so I was worried about fit. I ordered a medium and was so happy to see it fit her perfect. It doesn't sag and it covers down to her tail so she doesn't look like she is wearing s belly shirt. It even does nice in the rain! It might be soaked but she is dry underneath! I would recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Taci Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Runs smaller than size chart
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the XL for my shepherd/cattledog mix who is roughly 55 lbs. Based on her measurements and the sizing chart she should have had plenty of room. Unfortunately, it was too tight. Fabric seems soft enough and decently sturdy so returning and will try the XXL. However, I would highly disagree with the sizing chart that an XL would fit a German Shepherd or Retriever since my pup is smaller than your average one of either of those breeds.
customer_reviews.author: JennK

customer_reviews.title: Decent Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It fits great around the dogs body. Left enough room for my dogs to use the restroom without getting it on the hoodie. The dogs like wearing them. Nice vibrant colors. Cons: I have large dogs, the small hood part of the hoodie is tiny and useless. Hard to get on and off, since it has no snaps or other fasteners. It's a true human style hoodie. So, if they increased the size of the hood, it would be an awesome product. My dogs still like them and wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, But Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I got this in really good time after ordering it and was super excited. Got a large for my 5 month old chow chow but unfortunately it was too small. I don't understand why? The dimensions read "18" inches, but I couldn't even get it over my sweet boy's head. Nice and thick though. Looks as advertised. Wish it would have fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful - NO complaints!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loved her first Z&Z hoodie that I bought her on an Oregon beach trip so much that I had to come find them on Amazon and buy another when she wore it out! Always seemed more confident and happy when wearing it and didn't "nervous bite" herself. 10 outta 10 purchase! She just passed a few months ago and I still have them. The newer one I might bequeath to a friend's dog soon, when I'm ready to part with it, but will recommend they buy a second one too. Thanks Zack & Zoey for making my dog so happy with her purple and then later pink hoodies! I personally loved the keyhole opening for the leash.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this. The only reason I didn’t return was that it eas long enough for dachshund body and my pup needed a lighter version anyway. BUT the description led me to believe this was sweatshirt material and its not- it’s more like teeshirt material.
customer_reviews.author: ceecoasts

customer_reviews.title: Not going to use on walks.. but fine for indoors.
customer_reviews.text: The sweatshirt is made of a nice material and the color is nice. However, this is clearly not meant to fit every dog shape. It’s awkwardly tight on his chest, but SUPER long and loose on his torso. I will let him wear it inside for warmth because it’s not detrimentally the wrong size. However, I’m not going to risk having to wash it after every walk because he pees on it. It’s just way too loose around his torso. :( Still cute and he seems to be okay with it. I ordered an XL in royal blue. My dog is a 55 pound lab mix.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Weird size. Okay style overall.
customer_reviews.text: Hood is cute. Buttons on front is weird for a dog, buttons on back would be nicer. At least the snaps are plastic, but they aren’t covered with fabric, so won’t they feel chilly against my dog’s belly?! Sizing is totally whack. Ordered a Medium but it didn’t fit my 10-pound dog. Reordered for a large. Will see. Fabric is as described, no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw on a nice hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Nice sweatshirt but I have to return it. My dog has many hoodies. This one fit with the exception of the underside... it is far too long and he would be in it. Major design flaw. All his other shirts are shorter in the belly and he never risks peeing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Shared Pei Lab mix and he gets really cold in the winter (he has no undercoat of fur). We searched forever for a jacket that would cover his belly and didn't find anything for big dogs except these sweatshirts. They are made really well and fit him perfectly. I'd suggest sizing up if your dog has a wide chest (not just big around). Tank has 3 of these now in an XL and is 68lbs, 30" for a standard chest measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Not for boy dogs, really cute style though
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers have pointed out this is not meant for boy dogs. I thought that it was no big deal and I would just alter it myself but who am I kidding. I don't even own a sewing kit so that's never going to happen. We bought a large for our 25 lbs. beagle based on some other reviewers recommendations but it was way too big. It was really super cute though! Even though it didn't fit that well I didn't return it because it is like PJ's he can wear in the house when we're not going out.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Hooded Yorkie!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hoodie! It was thick enough to use in the winter to keep my Yorkie warm. He dances around every time I pull it out. The downside to this hoodie, however, is the sizing. My Yorkie weighs 7.5 lbs and it fits him nicely. However, the x-small in red ended up being larger than the x-small I purchased in black. The inconsistent sizing is frustrating. Since the red is larger, I have to fold the hem up otherwise he pees on it. The hoodie has lasted through several washings with no shrinkage. There has been a bit of pilling, but it still looks good. I will order more colors since they are so cute and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Cyanide

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES wearing clothes and I love that this hoodie looks like one of mine, lol. We get lots of compliments when we take our daily walks in this hoodie. I've washed and dried it several times and it hasn't shrunk. Will definitely be buying more colors!
customer_reviews.author: chrysynthia2

customer_reviews.title: The hoodie fits him absolutely perfect!! Not too big and not too tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size small for my 15 lb rat terrier, since he really hates the cold and starts shivering anytime it hits 50 or below. The hoodie fits him absolutely perfect!! Not too big and not too tight. Keeps him nice and warm, he seems to like it! Comes right up to me and points his nose up for me to slip it over his head. It has held up well through quite a few machine washings already. Don't expect the hood to actually go over your dog's head though haha... between my pup's long neck and massive upright ears, that is not happening!
customer_reviews.author: yardmonkey1209

customer_reviews.title: Mona-moo-bear approved!
customer_reviews.text: My American Bulldog, Mona, loves to wear clothes. When I bought this, the weather in Pennsylvania has been in the -0s so with her short hair, it sucks to be her. I bought her the tomato red hoodie and it matches one that I wear, so it was a good first attempt at buying one for her. It is a bit long, but that's okay, as it keeps her warm and it fits around the chest. It also fits good under her service dog jacket. Not to mention, she looks adorable in it and she loves wearing it because now she isn't shivering so much, even when laying on the living room floor in this old drafty house.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my POODLE sisters. Zach & Zoey always make home runs!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my standard poodles. They're soft, warm, easy to put on & take off & launder beautifully. The hoodie part works well when they're out in the snow.The dogs are comfortable in them & don't try to pull them off. Sizing is accurate. People always compliment them. Arrived packaged beautifully & on time. The value is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, long-lasting. Recommend dark colors for wintry/rainy weather
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my little girl (puppy). It's warm and cozy. I wash it inside-out, as I have a couple others that are older, and they tend to get pills after a couple years of wear. Yep, couple years! So, no need to wash inside-out if you don't plan on keeping this in tip-top condition for more than 1-2 years. I probably will never need to throw away even the old hoodies in this exact brand/style, and they're already about 6 years old. Get darker colors for wintry and rainy weather. Mud tends to stain the lighter colors, even after washing in the machine
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to order the next size up, so I gave this to a friend who has a tiny little shih tzu. The next size up says it will fit a Boxer. Um, no. No it will not. My dog is a terrier mix, and the 20" just barely fits him. I guess you should assume the sizes refer to how big they are at 6 months old?? Anyway. The quality is decent, especially for the price, but you should size way way up, and if you have a big dog, shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Librarijen

customer_reviews.title: Warm Pitbull is a happy Pitbull!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the snugly fit, wasn't sue if I could get my pitbull to figure out this was a good idea. But once we got it on, he loved it. Quickly figured out that I would have to make some adjustments.(cut away fabric so he could relieve himself without getting the hoodie soaked). Washed really well, not fraying where I trimmed it A little long at the rear end because of his broad chest can't get the neck exactly where it needs to be. GOOD ENOUGH!
customer_reviews.author: lisa evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hoodie because our dog was suffering from skin allergies and we used this little hoodie to help prevent her from scratching and licking herself raw. We have a 45lb pit bull and it fit perfectly. I was concerned it would "roll" up her back but it didn't . It washes well too. The dog is no longer dealing with allergy issues but this is a keeper! The only thing I would like to see changed is the neck area needs to be stretched out to be comfortable for dogs with a thick neck like pit bulls. The material stretched just fine and no tearing. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was way too small for my 60lb pit bull but it was well made and true to color. I may purchase another larger size from Zack and Zoey since the quality was good and my dog has scars that can be bothersome to her in the extreme cold and heat.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieCat

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is weird. Or someone doesn't know what they're doing.
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. I ordered a Large for our cattle dog mix (she's wearing the L in photos) and it's a little tight around her chest. Ordered an XL to see if it gave her more room in the chest ad they sent a medium I'm assuming because it's way smaller than the Large, but it costs more to return it than I paid for the item. I'll see if it fits my Boston but it's annoying that I paid for an item, they sent the wrong size and now I'm just stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference in sizes
customer_reviews.text: I bought the light blue hoodie last year in a large and it shrank. So this year I ordered an x-large and it is huge compared to the large and it way too large for my dog. I'm returning the x-large and looking for a hoodie from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: D. Payne

product_meta.title: Zack & Zoey Basic Hoodie for Dogs
product_meta.description:
Color:Raspberry Sorbet| Size:Medium

Zack & Zoey Basic Dog Hoodies are poly-cotton sweatshirts with ribbed sleeves and hem, for a comfy fit.



 * Classic styling includes a kangaroo pocket, just like the version for humans
 * A wardrobe staple for any well-dressed dog!
 * Available in a mix of basic and bold bright colors



Material: 65% polyester, 35% cotton
Size: Medium 13" neck, 22" chest, 16" length
Care: Machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle. Line dry.
feature_bullets: Hooded sweatshirts are comfortable, cozy fit
Made of 65 percent polyester and 35 percent cotton

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
